name: Neon Gravity X
description:
A 1-week group project made by students: Simon Lindström, Merle Albrecht, Moa Bergström, Pontus Sundqvist, Ebba Bernbro, Hugo Tillander.

We had a great time making this game, it's made with the purpose of potentially being displayed at events for random people to try, and it ramps up in difficulty very quickly so people who test the game at said events won't play for too long before the next person's turn. 

Total game time in one play attempt is between 1-5 minutes.
